items.title: Drugmakers, hospitals prepared for medical emergencies along border states
items.description: Sources with the influential Indian pharmaceutical body told Moneycontrol that the industry is always geared up to support the government with necessary medicines, and medical consumables.

items.title: Coal India: A sequential rise in volume off-take in Q4 in an overall challenging year
items.description: Recent price increases, expected production growth, and other factors augur well for the current fiscal

items.title: Titan Company: Healthy Q4FY25 results, robust outlook
items.description: Notwithstanding a sharp increase in gold prices, industry tailwinds, a broader product portfolio and product re-engineering are expected to sustain the growth momentum for the jewellery business.

items.title: Tata Motors: A clear winner from the US-UK trade deal
items.description: JLR, the UK subsidiary of the company, relies heavily on the North American market for sales

items.title: Why this defence stock is our tactical pick this week
items.description: Cochin Shipyard’s order book remains strong at Rs 22,000 crore, over five times its annual revenue, providing a strong revenue visibility. The order pipeline is equally strong and growing

items.title: MCPro Quick Take: Volume growth in Britannia Industries precedes margins
items.description: Normal monsoon and better execution in non-core brands expected to aid growth recovery

items.title: SC judgment on Bhushan Steel bankruptcy is a blow to JSW and Indian business
items.description: The IBC suffers from systemic issues that would need radical changes
